author: hwright
msg: Fix a couple more deprecation warnings.
* subversion/svnlook/main.c
(print_tree): Use svn_dirent_basename() in place of svn_path_basename().
* subversion/svnserve/main.c
(main): Same.

author: gstein
msg: Make the debug stuff automatically available everywhere.
* subversion/include/svn_types.h:
(): include private/svn_debug.h if SVN_DEBUG is defined. similar to
including svn_error.h, we want svn_debug.h available.

author: gstein
msg: We were not setting the DELETED flag properly in the stub entry structures
built from the parent directory. Since the regular WC_DB refuses to give
us that information, we do an end-around to get the flag.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/entries.c:
(read_entries_new): expand a mysterious comment. if we're filling out an
entry structure for a stub subdir, then fetch the DELETED flag by
using svn_wc__db_temp_is_dir_deleted().
(write_entry): stop creating a subpool and just rename the parameter
'scratch_pool'. the one caller is doing the right thing, so no need
for an extraneous pool create/destroy.
(entries_write_body): leave a comment about keeping 'repos_root' in the
scratch_pool. use the iterpool when writing out THIS_DIR
* subversion/libsvn_wc/wc_db.h:
(svn_wc__db_temp_is_dir_deleted): new declaration
* subversion/libsvn_wc/wc_db.c:
(enum statement_keys, statements[]): add a new statement to see if a
base node is not-present.
(svn_wc__temp_is_dir_deleted): new function to fetch the DELETED flag
from a directory's parent directory.

author: hwright
msg: * subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_ops.c
(erase_from_wc): Close the directory's access baton before attempting to
blow away its contents.

author: hwright
msg: * subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_ops.c
(erase_from_wc): Use an iterpool within a couple of loops.
